body_html:
Oops I am sorry. I can send a patch in a few hours.

On 27.07.2016, at 01:51, yifeif notifications@github.com wrote:

In tensorflow/core/kernels/cwise_ops_test.cc:

Graph* g = new Graph(OpRegistry::Global());

  • Tensor data(DT_FLOAT, TensorShape({64, 64, num / (64 * 64)}));
  • Tensor data(dtype, TensorShape({64, 64, num / (64 * 64)}));
    CHECK_GT(data.NumElements(), 0);
    data.flat().setRandom();
    Can we have a patch PR to fix this?

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.
